item.title: About Me
item.description: Personal Details Hello I’m Yakup. I have worked as full stack developer for about 2 years and I love creating games. I’m in the transition phase to being a game developer. You can find my career timeline and contact details below. Yakup TÜRKAN Contact Details contact@yakupturkan.com.tr @mustbefilled yakup-türkan Ümraniye/İstanbul Experience Software Developer Feb 2019 - Jun 2020 1 year 6 months Infonal Kozyatağı/İstanbul I have worked on several components in-migration from PLSQL to Java and C# to Java, and some middleware integration to the core banking system.
